title: Amazing experience.
text: This place is amazing. Great people working there and made us feel like English Royalty!! Food is great and surprisingly affordable too. Service for house keeping , valet parking or even people working at front desk and gate and in Restaurant are just great and so respectful. A must visit Hotel with lots of history.

title: Birthday Celebration
text: Made reservations for 8. They were nice enough to take as they usually don’t take reservations. Excellent food and wine and to end the day with , they provided free cake. Thank you

title: Destination wedding
text: On a free day we took a minibus tour to the grand mosque. Open from 8 to 11 for visitors of any religion. Ah I a calming place and once you enter , you can feel God and you will start praying. Nice and cool inside due to marble structure. Rug is a one PCs and weighs about 17 tons. Chandilier with Swarovski crystals weighs 9 tons. A must visit place.

title: Destination wedding
text: Amazing place , Amazing people and Amazing city. Can’t say more about it. It was fun filled experience and plan to visit again. Many many places to see. Relaxing place for a nice and quite vacation. Lagoon rooms are amazing and uniquely situated on the property.
place: Al Bustan Palace A Ritz-Carlton Hotel

title: Nice late night dinner.
text: Food was very good and not too expensive either. Was surprised to find a Good Indian Restaurant in this Island.

title: Short vacation during our trip to India.
text:
Today is our last day and it almost feels like we are leaving our family and friends.

Thank you so much for the hospitality here at Fishermen’s cove. It’s an amazing place and people are so great.

Thank you for the wonderful time provided to my family and my friend’s family.

Oliver and girls at the front desk , Julian and Bernadette and girls at Cardinal are so Friendly people that they took care of us for four days as Family members.

MICHIEL ZOONEN , personal thank you to you and your Amazing team for being so gracious and thoughtful of our convenience and comfort.

Due to restrictions of stars , I can just offer the best which is 5 star but I wish they had 10 stars and I still would be asking for more stars.

We will be leaving you today but memories will remain with us throughout our life time.

Thank you once again MICHIEL And the team for everything.

title: Twkenout
text: Great food and great price. Fresh food and great taste. Will surly visit over and over agin. All of their curries and starters are amazing.

title: Adult night out
text: Place was full due to an engagement party so we set at the bar. Ordered dinner at the bar. Service was fantastic at the bar and bar tender was very responsive but I am not sure what happened to the taste of food. Ordered club sandwich and got wrap. My wife asked for salad and cutons were like large PCs of bread. I am not sure what is going on but they need to tighten on quality and presentation. What happened to the best potato fries ? And the reason for 3 instead of five star. Always was five star.

title: Worst experience
text: We were trying at Petinos Beach Hotel. Restaurant right under our room. Thought owned by same owners , room charge aaa not allowed. Asked to sit in open space close to water but kept saying it’s windy etc etc just to discourage us in occupying larger table. Worst food and attitude of people at restaurant was horrible.

title: Perfect service AAA rating by us.
text:
Pre arranged out Airport transfer on line and Nikos was quick in replying. In time at Athens Aiport and our way to Electra Palace. Chauffeur was very polite and knowledgeable and guided us for lots to see in Athens. Called Nikos on his cell phone and requested to arrange city taxi service for next two days. Made several 5 -6 hours trips to see various places. The chauffeur Consto was truly a great chauffeur and guide combined. We really enjoyed our time with him.

Last evening , sent a message to Nikos for time hangs on next morning flight and got answer back in few minutes confirming the change. I came to know that Nikos was on vacation but still attended to work. This guy is a workaholic.

Great for us that we found them. It was truly a pleasure visiting Athens and learning the history. Will surly visit back when time permits.

ATS is a must have service.

title: Must see
text: This place is amazing. Really good place to learn history of acropolis and surrounding area. Beautifully structured place with excavation site under

title: Wonder of the world
text: Breath taking structure and just unforgettable experience of life time. A little steep climb but every step we took was worth it. If you are in Athens, this is a must place.

title: One more place from our bucket list
text: During our trip in Greece, one dime morning we went to this archeological wonder in Corinth, Greece. About 1 hour from Athens market place. It was hot but the place was worth every bottle of water . A must see.

title: Difficult climb
text: On our way to Temple of Apollo , our chauffeur challenged us to climb top of old fort which was very very dicxicilt climb. My wife and started and at 1/10 of the climb , she refused to go up as this is one of the most difficult climb. I ventured to go all the way up. Took me two hours to complete SEWN sides of this old fort but I did it. Total 6700 steps and 57 stories climb. Must see beauty from top of the Greece.

title: Amazing work in 1880
text: The canal was initially proposed in classical times and a failed effort was made to build it in the 1st century AD.[2] Construction started in 1881 but was hampered by geological and financial problems that bankrupted the original builders. It was completed in 1893 but, due to the canal's narrowness, navigational problems and periodic closures to repair landslides from its steep walls, it failed to attract the level of traffic expected by its operators.

title: What an experience
text:
Cape Sounion is located about 70 kilometres south-southeast of Athens, at the southernmost tip of the Attica peninsula.

Legend says that the Aegean Sea was named after mythological Greek King Aegeus who leapt to his death off the cliff of the cape erroneously convinced that his son had been killed in his contest with the Minotaur.

title: One more stop before temple of Poseidon
text:
Vouliagmeni Lake is a mineral spa that is reported to have many healing properties for many ailments.

Thanks to its constant between 22 and 27 degrees Celsius water temperature, it functions as a year-round spa.

It is also ideal for swimming and snorkeling

title: Not happy at all
text:
Reached hotel after delays in ferry times. Reached and called for their complimentary shuttle and it took 25 min for driver to show up. By the time we reached hotel , it was 2.45pm and we had only one night. Took us to Petinos Hotel ( sister company ) and again had to wait for bellboy to come and get us. Finally at the hotel and they had one person at the desk. It took us over 35 min to check in and it was 3.45pm before we reached the room. Loactio. Was good and view was good but later in the evening we found out that the room they gave was right on top of their restaurant and we were getting constant noise of loud motor running. Finally after dinner at their restaurant ( WILL NOT RECOMMEND ANY ONE SUE TO THE ATTITUDE OF WAITERS ) when came up in room to sleep , just could not because of noise. Called the front desk and call went to their sister hotel and guy on the other side of the line was most rude person I have ever heard in my life. Finally got the front desk after 10 min and asked them why this noise. I was told that this is the first time they have heard any complaint. So I asked them to send someone and confirm. Got the technical person and from my room , he confirmed to the front desk about the noise. Said it is from the restaurant and should go away when they close ( midnight ). They asked us if we wanted to change our room at 10.30pm !!! Whole night we could not sleep.

Hotel website confirmed room service but no room service on our side of the hotel. Said we will have welcome bottle of wine , I have not seen till this date. It’s a shame that such a great location and such a waste of money Euro 480.

In the morning they offered me discount and it bout asking what they wanted to give , I just asked them for the bill and hey adjusted 30%. Big deal.

Be careful with your expectations. If high, you surly be sad.

I will wait and see their reaction and if I receive any explanation or word of sorry and compensation or no, and update my review.

title: House warming visit
text: Nice location but surprised that they don’t keep Tea in room and no bottled water. Even though you are Platinum member , you don’t get them in room. Go to front desk and they give you one. Had to complain and finally they put 4 bottles in room refrigerator. Breakfast was nothing to talk about. Paper plates , powered egg preparations and plastic tableware. I am not sure how Marriott allows this.

title: Wow
text: Visit became lifetime remembrance. Beautiful location, unbelievable Sunset everyday visible from our sitting area. Everyone was very helpful at the hotel. Not too far from the Airport. Will surly recommend every friend to visit Santorini and stay at this hotel.

title: Perfect location
text: Loved this hotel. Perfect location. Walking distance to all of the great places. Front desk people, room service , housekeeping and everyone at the hotel were great. Spa and people working there are great too. Will surly recommend all my friends.

title: Take out order
text: Totally frustrating. Orders were all mixed up and even an item was wrong. Instead of chicken parm grinder they have meatball grinder. When called , they said that you got everything you orders except the grinder to when you come next time we will give you free grinder. Do you think after this experience, I will go back to claim my $10 and hate myself ? I have know this place from a long time but now the service is gone to the dogs.
